page.title: 09THE MONDAY CLUB
page.content: The Monday Club was started in 1967 to allow women to get together and listen to interesting speakers. People have been going to Monday Club for periods of 2 months to 16 years. 15 to 20 people go to Monday Club and most of them like it. Most people like meeting people, talks & outings. Recent outings have been to Church's China Shop, the P.O. in Northampton, the Express Lifts Tower and a dinner at the Heart of England pub. The Monday Club is only for women because it is a member of the National Association of Women's Clubs. Men are invited if the subject being discussed interests them. The Monday Club performs a pantomime every year and most people who go have been on stage at some time. They also raise money for charity; they have raised money to provide a Guide Dog and also the swings and slide on the Green.
